mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id, b.book_title, b.book_writer, b.book_pub, b.book_date, b.genre_id, g.genre_name, b.book_price, b.book_count, b.book_comm, b.book_isbn, b.book_image_path FROM Book b LEFT JOIN Genre g ON b.genre_id = g.genre_id ORDER BY b.book_id ASC

SELECT b.book_id, b.book_title, b.book_writer, b.book_pub, b.book_date, b.genre_id, g.genre_name, b.book_price, b.book_count, b.book_comm, b.book_isbn, b.book_image_path FROM Book b LEFT JOIN Genre g ON b.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE b.book_id = #{book_id}

SELECT b.book_id, b.book_title, b.book_writer, b.book_pub, b.book_date, b.genre_id, g.genre_name, b.book_price, b.book_count, b.book_comm, b.book_isbn, b.book_image_path FROM Book b LEFT JOIN Genre g ON b.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE 1=1
AND ( LOWER(b.book_title) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{q}) || '%' OR LOWER(b.book_writer) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{q}) || '%' )
AND b.genre_id = #{genreId}
ORDER BY b.book_id ASC
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM Genre ORDER BY genre_id ASC
